title: Create VlogunrealPromo marketing website with promo-video request submission

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for the brand name “VlogunrealPromo” that targets Restaurants, Hotels, and similar businesses looking for AI promotional videos.

quotes: VlogunrealPromo Ke Naam Se Website Banaao Jo Restaurants, Hotels, Etc Brands Ke Liye Ai Promotional Video

acceptanceCriteria: The site prominently displays the name “VlogunrealPromo”.
The site clearly communicates that the service is AI promotional videos for Restaurants/Hotels/etc.
All user-facing UI text is in English.

requirements.text: Implement core site sections/pages: Hero, Services/What you get, Industries (Restaurants/Hotels/etc), How it works, Pricing (informational only), Examples/Portfolio gallery, FAQ, and Contact/Request CTA.

quotes: Website ... for ... Brands ... Ai Promotional Video

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation provides access (via sections or routes) to Services, Industries, How it works, Pricing, Examples, FAQ, and Contact/Request.
Each section has clear headings and concise explanatory copy in English.
A clear CTA (e.g., “Request a Promo Video”) is visible above the fold and near the bottom of the page.

requirements.text: Add a “Request a Promo Video” form that collects lead details and requirements, including: business name, business type (Restaurant/Hotel/Other), contact name, email, phone/WhatsApp, location (city/country), website/social links, desired video length, desired style/mood, language, deadline (date), budget range, and free-text notes.

quotes: ... Brands Ke Liye Ai Promotional Video

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all specified fields.
Client-side validation blocks submission when required fields are missing or invalid (e.g., email format).
On success, the UI shows a clear confirmation message and a submission/reference ID.

requirements.text: Persist promo-video requests in the Motoko backend canister with stable storage and expose an API to create a new request and fetch a request by its reference ID.

quotes: ... Brands Ke Liye Ai Promotional Video

acceptanceCriteria: A Motoko type exists to represent a promo request with all form fields plus createdAt timestamp and a generated reference ID.
Submitted requests are stored in stable state and survive canister upgrades.
Backend exposes a method to create a request and returns the generated reference ID.
Backend exposes a method to fetch request details by reference ID.

requirements.text: Connect the frontend form submission to the backend using the project’s actor integration and manage submission state with React Query (loading, success, error).
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form calls the backend create-request method.
While submitting, the UI shows a loading state and prevents duplicate submissions.
On error, the UI shows an English error message and allows retry.
On success, the returned reference ID is shown to the user.

requirements.text: Add an “Examples” gallery section that showcases multiple promotional video concepts using static thumbnail cards (title, short description, and image).
acceptanceCriteria: Examples section displays at least 6 example cards.
Cards are responsive (grid layout adjusts from mobile to desktop).
Each card includes an image, a title, and a 1–2 line description in English.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a premium promo-video studio: cinematic dark neutrals with warm accents (avoid blue/purple), modern typography, and consistent spacing/components across all sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme uses a consistent palette dominated by dark neutrals with warm accents (e.g., gold/coral) and does not rely on blue/purple as primary branding.
Typography hierarchy is consistent (headings, body, buttons).
Buttons, cards, and section layouts look cohesive across the site.

requirements.text: Add a static assets integration to render the generated brand images (logo/wordmark/hero/examples) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the appropriate sections (header/hero/examples).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are referenced as static assets (not served via backend).
Header/hero includes the logo/wordmark.
Hero uses the hero background image.
Examples gallery uses the provided thumbnail images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no multi-canister backend architecture).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
No third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is allowed if authentication is later added.
No external databases; all persistence must be in Motoko stable storage.
nonGoals: Implementing actual AI video generation or integrating with external AI/LLM/video services.
Uploading/hosting large media files directly in the app (collect links instead).
Payments/checkout (e.g., Stripe) and order fulfillment workflows.
Admin dashboard/CRM features for managing leads (unless requested later).

required: Minimal cinematic logo mark, abstract camera/film motif, dark background variant (vlogunrealpromo-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide wordmark lockup “VlogunrealPromo” in a modern cinematic style (vlogunrealpromo-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
Cinematic hero background illustration with subtle film/grain lighting, no text (vlogunrealpromo-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
Promotional video thumbnail image: Restaurant concept, cinematic food/ambient lighting (example-thumb-restaurant.dim_800x450.png)
Promotional video thumbnail image: Hotel concept, luxury interior lighting (example-thumb-hotel.dim_800x450.png)
Promotional video thumbnail image: Cafe concept, cozy warm tones (example-thumb-cafe.dim_800x450.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for all user-facing UI text in the app.
